message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $22,000.  I believe in its quality and value, and I'm sure it will be very useful for you.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value is considerably higher. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000?
I understand that you think the product is valuable, but I'm still not convinced it's worth $18,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $14,000?
